clang-analyzer-core.StackAddressEscape.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-core.StackAddressEscape
Check that addresses to stack memory do not escape the function.
The
clang-analyzer-core.StackAddressEscape
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-core.StackAddressEscape.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
